careers.title: Science Podcaster/Producer
careers.whyThis: Science Podcaster/Producer uses the Physical Sciences and Biological Sciences you’ve already been learning. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Science Podcaster/Producer involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Science Podcaster/Producer now and understand what to work towards.
